Title: Removes limitations on the hours of operation of a demonstration program imposing fines for failure of a vehicle operator to comply with posted maximum speed limits in a school speed zone in the city of New York
Summary: Removes limitations on the hours of operation of a demonstration program; imposes fines for failure of a vehicle operator to comply with posted maximum speed limits in a school speed zone in the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the hours of operation of a demonstration program imposing fines for failure of a vehicle operator to comply with posted maximum speed limits in a school speed zone in the city of New York
